meanings.definition: The act or process of making something stable or steady.
meanings.sent1: The stabilizations of the table were done by adding extra support underneath.
meanings.sent2: The stabilizations of the economy led to increased investor confidence.
meanings.sent3: The stabilizations of the wobbly chair involved using a stack of books as a temporary fix.
meanings.sent4: Her calming presence acted as stabilizations in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The stabilizations of the boat in rough waters saved them from capsizing.
